history.description: Lead a team to develop and maintain the commercial website and convert the current code base to implement SSR and client side React apps.
responsibilities: Perform code reviews to ensure standardization and efficiency
Work directly with the design team to actualize and implement redlines
Assist junior developers to work through blockers
Maintain code base documentation for future generations of developers
Maintain behavioral tracking and analytics rules implemented via Adobe DTM, iPerceptions, Google Adwords, and others

history.description: Used skills with Node, Angular, SQL, ASP, XHTML, CSS, Javascript, and AJAX, while working as part of a team to develop innovative logistics, marketing, and contact management technologies.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented development conventions for new application
Developed new applications using Node, Angular, and MongoDB
Created wireframes for new applications with focus on UI/UX
Worked directly with clients to develop new or improve current functionality to meet their needs
Received copy from clients and collaborated to create landing pages and emails
Implementing web standards and the jQuery library into the product
Designed database tables using SQL to accommodate new or existing functional

history.description: Worked with the mission operations control center at Westover ARB to coordinate and dispatch personnel to successfully refuel aircraft in a timely and efficient manner. Also, maintained accurate billing records and accounting for all fuels and cryogenics products.
history.jobTitle: Fuels Service Center Supervisor and Lead Accountant
responsibilities: Processed over 12 thousand fueling transactions, ensuring timely and accurate billing
Completed 6 End of Month/Year fuels account reconciliations with zero discrepancies
Maintained 100% document retention, resulting in zero lost fuels transactions
Supervised 3 personnel, guaranteeing timely/accurate accounting of fuels transactions
Trained 6 personnel on proper use of petroleum products and facilities
Authored and presented daily safety/environmental briefings for 11 personnel

history.description: Worked directly with the Fuels Service Center at Dover AFB to distribute jet fuel and ground fuels, as well as issuing cryogenics products in a timely manner. Also, performed hydrant systems operations, including refuels, defuels, flushes, transfers, and receipts
history.jobTitle: Fuels Specialist and Fuels Service Center Accountant

history.description: Worked directly with the Fuels Service Center at Dover AFB to distribute jet fuel and ground fuels, as well as issuing cryogenics products in a timely manner. Also, performed hydrant systems operations, including refuels, defuels, flushes, transfers, and receipts
